snippet: Dan Richards has told critics of his hunt that because he killed a cougar in a state where such activity is legal, there is no reason to leave his position.
lead_paragraph: Dan Richards has told critics of his hunt that because he killed a cougar in a state where such activity is legal, there is no reason to leave his position.

headline.seo: Game Commissioner Who Killed Mountain Lion Says He Will Not Resign
headline.main: California Game Commissioner Defends Killing Mountain Lion, Saying He Won’t Resign
headline.print_headline: California Game Commissioner Defends Killing Mountain Lion, Saying He Won’t Resign
